name: Lava Ajax Search
author: Lavacode

sections.description:
Lava Ajax Live Search Provides Ajax live search for posts, custom post type in your WordPress site. It also works for BuddyPress, BBPress search.
It provides a search shortcode to place on pages you want.

FEATURES

  • BuddyPress search supported.
  • BBPress search supported.
  • Post search supported.
  • Custom post suppoted by developer mode.
  • Buddypress 2.9 compatible
  • Responsive design
  • Etc

LANGUAGES

  • English (default)
    We are happy to have volunteer to assist to translate in your own languages.
    Please email us at wp.lava.code@gmail.com , if you are interested. We will add it on next update.

Intro page : http://lava-code.com/ajax-search
Documentation : http://lava-code.com/ajax-search/documentation/
Demo site : http://lava-code.com/ajax-search/demo/

Languages

It is currently (v0.1) available only English version. we are happy to have volunteer to assist to translate in your own languages.
Please email us at wp.lava.code@gmail.com , if you are interested.
Thank you in advance.
sections.installation:
Install via Search:

  1. In WordPress admin, visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for “Lava Ajax Search”
  3. Click the “Install Now” link.
  4. Once installed, click the “Activate Plugin” link.
  5. Visit settings to setup pages

Install via Upload:

  1. In WordPress admin, visit “Plugins” > “Add New” > “Upload”
  2. Upload lava-ajax-search.zip file
  3. Once uploaded, click the “Activate Plugin” link
  4. Visit settings to setup pages

That’s it!
If you need more documentation, please visit here ( http://lava-code.com/ajax-search/documentation/ )
sections.faq:
Can I use my existing WordPress theme?

Yes! Lava Ajax Search works out-of-the-box with nearly every WordPress theme.

Will this work on WordPress multisite?

Yes! If your WordPress installation has multisite enabled, Lava Ajax Search will work on it.

Where can I get support?

We will open our own support site soon. or please email us at wp.lava.code@gmail.com.

Where can I find documentation?

Our codex can be found at http://lava-
code.com/ajax-search/documentation/.

Where can I report a bug?

Report bugs, suggest ideas, and participate in development at wp.lava.code@gmail.com .
